title: Will owning all the kins make the monthly sale sell a unbuyable skin? (mid-evil twitch, gray ww)
body: So from what ik every so often riot has a sale based on your most played champs for skins (seeing as every time they come i get twich, jax, yi in order) so would it be possible to receive a non-purchasable skin or would it just skip that champion?

replies.body:
Idk why he said it's "unlikely". To be accurate so there is no confusion, it's impossible; Limited skins cannot appear in Your Shop sales. You can check out their Support article for the "Your Teemoing Shop" to see how the run the shop deals; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/229510827-Your-Teemoing-Shop-FAQ

It's not impossible that they eventually make changes, but since they started Your Shop the rules have been consistent, and making Limited skins available in any way is the biggest change they can possible make.

It's unlikely these two skins would be in the personal shop since they were skins specifically used as rewards for the *Refer a Friend* program.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
